Description:
Detects attempts to use system dialog prompts to capture user credentials

Author: remotephone, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: GUI Input Capture - macOS
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path = '/usr/sbin/osascript' and (command like '%-e%' and command like '%display%' and command like '%dialog%' and command like '%answer%') and (command like '%admin%' or command like '%administrator%' or command like '%authenticate%' or command like '%authentication%' or command like '%credentials%' or command like '%pass%' or command like '%password%' or command like '%unlock%'))
